## terraplate apply

Runs terraform apply on all subdirectories

### Synopsis

Runs terraform apply on all subdirectories.

```
terraplate apply [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help       help for apply
  -j, --jobs int   Number of concurrent terraform jobs to run at one time (default 1)
```
